title: Amazon EventBridge to SNS to Lambda Function
description: Using SNS to forward EventBridge rule trigger to AWS Lambda Function

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to create a SNS Topic can be used as target for an EventBridge rule and then invokes a Lambda function.
This pattern deploys a EventBridge rule with target as SNS topic which has a Lambda function as subscription

bullets.text: Creating Amazon EventBridge rules that react to events

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
